name: gaming-music-bot
description: A Discord bot that plays music

scripts.docker-build: VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t gaming-music-bot:$VERSION -t gaming-music-bot:latest .
scripts.build-prod: npm run build && npm run docker-build && npm run docker-save
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run build-prod
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run build-prod
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run build-prod
